fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Poison**: Poison a target. They will take a *Basic* attack in 3 days. They will not be notified of this.
-**Wrath of the Forest**: Deal a Basic Attack to a Target. If they do not die, they will be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can only use one ability per night.
